course_title: U-Lab: Leading Profound Innovation for a More Sustainable World
course_description: _15.975 U-Lab: Leading Profound Innovation for a More Sustainable World_ is an interactive and experiential class about leading profound innovation for pioneering a more sustainable economy and society. The class is organized around personal reflection practices, relational practices, and societal practices. It focuses on the intertwined relationship between the evolution of capitalism, multi-stakeholder innovation, and presencing.
title: Course Metadata
